description:
Vovsoft Bulk Barcode Generator is a powerful desktop application that allows you to create thousands of barcodes from plain-text data in batch mode.

Vovsoft Bulk Barcode Generator is a powerful desktop application that allows you to create thousands of barcodes from plain-text data in batch mode.

The software supports 85 different barcode types, including popular formats such as Code 39, Code 128, EAN-13, and UPC-A. You can export barcodes in various image formats, including PNG, JPG, GIF, and BMP, making it highly flexible for different use cases.

The best part of this program is that all processing is done completely offline. You have full control over your private data, and no barcode information is ever sent to the internet.

Whether you're in retail, manufacturing, logistics, or asset management, this easy-to-use tool offers a fast, reliable, and private solution for generating barcodes in bulk.
